entry.title: Jaya-ask/patient-registration-app: A frontend-only Patient Registration App built with React and PGlite. It allows users to register patients, run raw SQL queries, persist data using IndexedDB, and sync updates across multiple browser tabs—all without a backend. Lightweight, responsive, and fully functional in the browser.
entry.content: A frontend-only Patient Registration App built with React and PGlite. It allows users to register patients, run raw SQL queries, persist data using IndexedDB, and sync updates across multiple browser tabs—all without a backend. Lightweight, responsive, and fully functional in the browser.
